text.section: This section applies only in Montgomery County.

section.section: The Board of License Commissioners may issue a special art gallery beer and wine license to a nonprofit or for-profit retail business engaged in the display and sale of original artwork by an individual artist or a group of artists.
A business that displays and sells commercially prepared or mass-produced artistic products may not be issued the license.

text.section: Notwithstanding any other provision of this article, a holder of the license may sell or serve beer and wine at retail for consumption on the premises when snacks are served during normal business hours but not later than midnight.
The license may not be transferred from the location for which the license was originally issued to another location.
